text: Hello, Leslie. Hi, Leonard.

2.6 for minestrone.

Wait, are you asking me out?
I was going to characterize it as the
modification of our colleagues friendship

What sort of experiment would you propose?
There is a generally accepted pattern in this
area. I would pick you up, take you to a
restaurant, then we would see a movie,
probably a romantic comedy featuring the
talents of Hugh Grant or Sandra Bullock.
Interesting. And would you agree that the
primary way we would evaluate either the

good night kiss?
Heart rate, pheromones, etcetera?
Yes.
Why don't we just stipulate that the date

You mean kiss you now?
Yes. Can you define the parameters of the

Closed mouth, but romantic mint.

Can I count down from three?

Are.

Sheldon, if you were a robot and I knew and

That depends when I learned that I'm a robot.
Will I be able to handle it?
Maybe. Although the history of science

Okay. Let me ask you this.
When I learned that I'm a robot, would I be
bound by Asimov's three Laws of robotics?
You might be bound by them right now.
That's true.
Have you ever harmed a human being or
through inaction, allow a human being to
come to harm? Of course not.
Have you ever harmed yourself or allowed

a human being would have been endangered?
Well, no.
I smell robot.
Hey, what's going on?

So how'd it go with Leslie?
Oh, we tried kissing, but the earth didn't

Oh, I've seen that look before.
This is just going to be two weeks of moping

Power down.
